Jürgen Klopp: "Sadio has looked good in training the last two days. He trained normally. Naby won't be available, but he is outside running already. Hendo has a little hamstring injury - not too serious, but he is not available tomorrow or on the weekend"

åè»’åˆè´
Henderson out for Red Star and Cardiff games. A chance for Fabinho to stake his claim for a place? Klopp said last week he was "close" to starting games.

Milner also came off with an issue vs Huddersfield so will have to see how that is. Midfield could be down to bare bones. Looks like Fabinho may get his first CL start for Liverpool tomorrow.

Even if Milner is fit, he's probably a player Klopp would rather not play tomorrow night after recent injury scares. Same applies to Lallana, who completed first significant minutes of season on Saturday. Shaqiri has played three 90 mins in last 10 days or so.
Trent AA: "We want to be challenging for both the PL and CL. There's still a lot to come - better performances is something we're striving for."
